label: DXC_EXCEPTION_CODE()
detail: Function (# ifndef __DXC_ERRORS__ # define __DXC_ERRORS__ # ifndef FACILITY_GRAPHICS # define FACILITY_GRAPHICS 3 6 # endif # define)
insertText: DXC_EXCEPTION_CODE(name, status) \ static constexpr DWORD EXCEPTION_##name = \ (0xc0000000u | (FACILITY_GRAPHICS << 16) | \ (0xff00u | (status & 0xffu)))
